Solution: Plataforma de Gestión Predictiva de Capacidad
Description: Algoritmos de aprendizaje automático predicen la capacidad turística diaria óptima para destinos. Sensores IoT monitorean condiciones en tiempo real. Registro blockchain asegura asignación transparente. Capacidad tokenizada y comercializable.
Key Partners: Local authorities, IoT providers, ML/AI experts, Blockchain developers, Tourism operators, Hotels
Key Activities: Data collection, Predictive analysis, Token management, Platform maintenance
Key Resources: IoT infrastructure, AI/ML algorithms, Blockchain platform, Data scientists
Value Propositions: Optimal tourism capacity management, Reduced overcrowding, Enhanced visitor experience, Sustainable tourism, Data-driven decision making
Customer Relationships: Automated service, Self-service portal, Community engagement
Channels: Mobile app, Web platform, API integrations, Partner networks
Customer Segments: Destination managers, Tourism operators, Local businesses, Tourists, Local authorities
Cost Structure: IoT infrastructure development and maintenance, AI/ML development and computing resources, Blockchain operation costs, Staff salaries (data scientists, developers, managers)
Revenue Streams: Token sales to tourism operators and visitors, Subscription fees from destination managers, Data insights and analytics services, Integration fees from third-party services

Description: Precios basados en criptomonedas se ajustan en tiempo real según la escasez. IA predice picos de demanda. Precios más altos en cripto durante horas punta incentivan visitas distribuidas. Recompensas por flexibilidad.
Key Partners: Local authorities, Blockchain developers, AI/ML experts, Local businesses, Financial institutions, Tourism operators
Key Activities: Cryptocurrency management, Dynamic pricing algorithm, Wallet development, Business onboarding
Key Resources: Blockchain platform, AI pricing algorithms, Digital wallet tech, Data analytics tools
Value Propositions: Optimized tourism flow, Fair & dynamic pricing, Incentivized off-peak visits, Enhanced local economic participation, Transparent transactions
Customer Relationships: Digital wallet support, Community building, Local business partnerships
Channels: Mobile wallet app, Merchant POS systems, Tourism websites, Local partnerships
Customer Segments: Tourists, Local businesses, Tourism operators, Local authorities, Destination managers
Cost Structure: Blockchain development and maintenance, AI/ML algorithm development, Digital wallet infrastructure, Marketing and business onboarding
Revenue Streams: Transaction fees, Currency exchange fees, Data insights and analytics services, Integration fees from businesses

Solution: Banco de Tiempo Descentralizado para Experiencias
Description: Plataforma P2P donde los turistas intercambian experiencias limitadas en el tiempo. IA empareja oferta y demanda. Contratos inteligentes gestionan créditos de tiempo. Vistas previas en RV de experiencias por franjas horarias disponibles.
Key Partners: Local experience providers, Blockchain developers, AI/ML experts, VR content creators, Tourism boards
Key Activities: Platform development, Experience curation, AI matching algorithm, Community management
Key Resources: Blockchain platform, AI matching algorithm, VR/AR technology, Community of users
Value Propositions: Unique local experiences, Efficient time use, Cultural exchange, Personalized matching, Transparent and fair exchange system, VR previews
Customer Relationships: Community building, Peer-to-peer support, Automated matching, Reputation system
Channels: Mobile app, Web platform, VR experience centers, Partner networks
Customer Segments: Tourists, Local experience providers, Cultural enthusiasts, Digital nomads
Cost Structure: Platform development and maintenance, AI algorithm development, VR content creation, Marketing and community management
Revenue Streams: Transaction fees, Premium features for users, VR preview fees, Data insights for tourism boards
